faqs.question: What is your typical project timeline?
faqs.answer: Project timelines vary based on complexity and scope. A simple website typically takes 4-6 weeks, while complex web applications can take 3-6 months. We'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation based on your specific requirements.

faqs.question: Do you offer ongoing maintenance and support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive maintenance and support packages. This includes regular updates, security patches, performance monitoring, and priority support. We believe in building long-term partnerships with our clients.

faqs.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
faqs.answer: We specialize in modern web technologies including Next.js, React, TypeScript, Node.js, and Python. For mobile development, we use React Native and Flutter. We stay current with industry trends to deliver cutting-edge solutions.

faqs.question: How do you handle project communication?
faqs.answer: We believe in transparent communication. You'll have a dedicated project manager, access to our project management tools, and regular status updates. We typically hold weekly check-ins and are available for quick questions via Slack or email.

faqs.question: What is your pricing model?
faqs.answer: We offer both fixed-price and time-and-materials pricing models depending on project needs. Fixed-price works well for clearly defined projects, while time-and-materials is better for evolving requirements. We'll recommend the best approach during our consultation.

faqs.question: Do you sign NDAs and handle confidential information?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We take confidentiality seriously and are happy to sign NDAs before any detailed discussions. All client data and intellectual property are handled with the utmost care and security.
